name: SpeedArt
description:
Rebuild images by placing the tiles in the right place as fast as you can.

The idea of the game is very simple: An image is broken into 9 tiles which are then placed randomly in a square

Your task is to replace them back in the original place in the shortest time possible.

There are more than 300 images chosen from the best photos, paintings and art in general from all ages.

It will show you maybe something new and beautiful

Enjoy!
